title: Using Multiple Buildpacks on Heroku
author: Nabil Jamaleddine
summary: Using custom libraries is possible through the declaration of custom buildpacks. David Dollar created the awesome [heroku-buildpack-multi](https://github.com/ddollar/heroku-buildpack-multi) repository for the purpose of including multiple buildpacks in the build process.

title: Setting up a Minecraft Server
author: Nabil Jamaleddine
summary: If you're a minecraft enthusiast like myself you've probably spent countless hours building structures, spelunking, or just trying to survive a zombie raid through the night. If you're an avid fan and haven't already set up your own server to play with a couple of friends get on it.
